header_text: You are shopping in a grocery store. As you are browsing some shelves, you accidently knock several cans on the floor and shoppers turn to look at you. The shoppers see the cans on the floor and respond with annoyance.

elements.text: In the end, you realize that people were probably just surprised by the sound and turned around reflexively. The shoppers saw that no one was injured and probably felt...

elements.name: You are shopping in a grocery store. As you are browsing some shelves, you accidently knock several cans on the floor and shoppers turn to look at you. The shoppers see the cans on the floor and respond with annoyance._Social Situations_entry2
